TopicTitle: Can not get back in after EVA

Articles.Content: Landed on the Mun probably 100 times by now. Try to go EVA and plant a flag. Then when I try to get back in I can't grab or board the vessel. Anyone else experiencing?
Only way I got it to work was to go back to space center.  Than back to the kerbal and try again.  And I don't even know if that was a fluke.
